mapper.select: SELECT c.*,m.no movie_no ,m.id movie_id, m.title , f.no file_no, f.id file_id, f.fk_id, f.fk_table, f.division, f.url FROM `cast` c join files f on c.id = f.fk_id join movie m on c.movie_id = m.id where c.movie_id = #{id}
SELECT c.*,m.no movie_no ,m.id movie_id, m.title FROM `cast` c join movie m on c.movie_id = m.id where c.name = #{name} order by c.no desc
SELECT c.*,m.no movie_no ,m.id movie_id, m.title , f.no file_no, f.id file_id, f.fk_id, f.fk_table, f.division, f.url FROM `cast` c join files f on c.id = f.fk_id join movie m on c.movie_id = m.id

SELECT c.*,m.no movie_no ,m.id movie_id, m.title , f.no file_no, f.id file_id, f.fk_id, f.fk_table, f.division, f.url FROM `cast` c join files f on c.id = f.fk_id join movie m on c.movie_id = m.id where c.id = #{id}

SELECT c.*,m.no movie_no ,m.id movie_id, m.title , f.no file_no, f.id file_id, f.fk_id, f.fk_table, f.division, f.url FROM `cast` c join files f on c.id = f.fk_id join movie m on c.movie_id = m.id WHERE (c.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR c.rule = REPLACE(#{keyword}, '감독', 'director') OR c.rule = REPLACE(#{keyword}, '배우', 'actor') OR c.movie_id = (SELECT m.id FROM movie m WHERE m.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') LIMIT 1 ) )
